name: Mailbox Mania - Rescue Your Email From The Viruses In The Cloud - Free Puzzle Game
name_original: Mailbox Mania - Rescue Your Email From The Viruses In The Cloud - Free Puzzle Game
description:
Play this SUPER FUN puzzle game where you rescue your Email From the Virus!

This exciting email themed puzzle game puts YOU in the cloud where you have to rescue your email from the NASTY RED viruses.

Do you have it takes? Play Now FREE!

-40 CHALLENGING LEVELS

-EASY to play, HARD to master

-FUN Physics Gameplay

-FREE! Download Now
